name: places/ChIJFTRg--9YwokR7jv6weTjsHQ
formattedAddress: 343 W 58th St #5, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 343 W 58th St #5, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: This office has been the best office I have ever gone to. Dr. Veligdan and his staff were very friendly. When we walk in we’re greeted by the office my manager who by the way since before meeting her and speaking to her over the phone was very friendly and welcoming. We walked in the office and she knew who my girls were without ever meeting them before and made them feel comfortable. She played with my little one and spoke to her and kept both my girls entertained while I was getting looked at. Then the dentist assistant was wonderful. My little one has sensory sensitivity and was very scared to open her mouth and the assistant was amazing and even though she didn’t get her teeth cleaned here she was sad because she wanted to. My older child was scared too but the dentist and assistant made her feel safe. I would highly recommend this place to anyone. I am extremely pleased. Oh and then Dr. Veligdan called personally and remembered my girls’ names and asked how we had felt and how was the little one. Very professional. I can see why he’s won so many patient satisfaction awards!! Thank you Dr and you will def see us again. Thank you to you and your staff!

originalText.text: The best, most informed, patient, caring dentist imaginable. Dr. V is truly in this because he cares about doing the best job possible and making sure his patients are taken care of. He takes his him, takes meticulous notes, and truly is the most educated and informed dentist. When other dentists have tried to tell me I needed more work Dr. V has always tried to limit the impact of work done and to save my teeth. He saved me from unnecessary root canals and more!

originalText.text: Wonderful experience! The dentist took his time to explain everything to me and also assisted with a referral that I needed. He followed up with a personal phone call after my procedure to make sure everything went well. He is kind, patient and knowledgeable. Crystal was also excellent in helping me to schedule the appointment and understand the follow up routine. Great prices and even better care!

text.text: Wonderful experience! The dentist took his time to explain everything to me and also assisted with a referral that I needed. He followed up with a personal phone call after my procedure to make sure everything went well. He is kind, patient and knowledgeable. Crystal was also excellent in helping me to schedule the appointment and understand the follow up routine. Great prices and even better care!

originalText.text:
Dr. Veligdan is an excellent, thorough & highly detailed dentist. He saved a cracked tooth of mine several years ago from needing a root canal or even a crown, by artistically reconstructing an entire missing 1/4 of the molar by hand. It is still perfect years later!

Not only does he take great care with his work, but he is very kind, personable, and considerate, as are his staff members. He treats patients like family.

Further, he only uses non-toxic materials, so you don't have to worry about things like BPAs in your fillings.

I have recommended him to all my family members & I would not go anywhere else!

My only reservation in leaving this review is worrying that he will get so busy with new customers, that I won't be able to get an appointment lol!

originalText.text: I am very happy to have met Dr. Veligdan. He was able to replace an existing crown without performing a root canal that my prior dentist was ready to perform.  He is a very knowledgeable and thorough dentist. Highly recommend.
